entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Indian Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -22.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -27.1°C
Wind: SW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
